attributes.action: The British people call for a General Election now!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom has suffered greatly under New Labour. People want their voices to be heard this is not the case. Many feel that this political party has turned into a dictorship. 

We put forward to you Gordon Brown and your party to call for an early General Election for 2009. Let the people decide who they want in power. At least try and undo some of the damage you have created in our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
